about_the_game:
"Wherever there is coin, there are Goblins!" - Famous Fahrul saying.

Although adventurers often find themselves at the wrong end of a goblin blade, there are a few goblins that have answered Queen Rosomon's call for aid. Enticed by the promise of great riches, these mercenaries will stop at nothing to fill their pockets with gold.

Take up arms against your kin and claim your royal reward with this free Goblin Cosmetic Pack, available to download now!
detailed_description:
"Wherever there is coin, there are Goblins!" - Famous Fahrul saying.

Although adventurers often find themselves at the wrong end of a goblin blade, there are a few goblins that have answered Queen Rosomon's call for aid. Enticed by the promise of great riches, these mercenaries will stop at nothing to fill their pockets with gold.

Take up arms against your kin and claim your royal reward with this free Goblin Cosmetic Pack, available to download now!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 17.10 (x64) or Mint 18.3 (Cinnamon) (x64) or Ubuntu 16.04 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4300 (2 * 1800) / AMD Athlon Dual Core 4450e (2 * 2300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 17.10 (x64) or Mint 18.3 (Cinnamon) (x64) or Ubuntu 16.04 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570T (2* 2900) / AMD FX-6100 (6 * 3300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.10.5 Yosemite or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2520M (2 * 2500)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 750M (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.10.5 Yosemite or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M390 (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: For The King: Goblin Cosmetic Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4300 (2 * 1800) / AMD Athlon Dual Core 4450e (2 * 2300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTX (768 MB) / Intel HD 4600 / Radeon HD 3850 (512 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570T (2* 2900) / AMD FX-6100 (6 * 3300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti (2048 MB) / Radeon HD 7850 (2048 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

short_description: Take up arms against your kin and claim your royal reward with this FREE Goblin Cosmetic Pack, available to download now!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Polish, Japanese, Korean
